case.state: ... Holy shit, am I, like, one of your favorite characters or somethin'?! Oh my god, thank you!
Wow, you must really like me, huh, ~player~? I dunno what to say...
Let's keep on rockin' together, ~player~!
At this rate, I oughta teach ya how to play somethin' so you can be part of the band, ~player~!
I think we can officially call ya a Melting Dreamscape roadie, ~player~! But that also means ya gotta help us set up our gear now!

Hey, real quick, you know there are other people to play with, right, ~player~? I mean, I appreciate that ya keep pickin' me, but I just want to make sure you don't think you're stuck with me or somethin'.
Did'ja get all my collectibles yet, ~player~? I would expect ya already did by now! They ain't hard.
Oh, it's you again, ~player~. You must've enjoyed my performance, eh? Glad to hear that!
Good to see ya again, ~player~! Are ya ready to rock some more?
Hey, ~player~. Did'ja enjoy that photo I gave ya, or did'ja enjoy that photo? Gah ha!... But seriously, I hope ya liked it! It's a one-of-a-kind, so don't lose it!
Oh, uh, sorry, ~player~, I don't got any more sexy photos to give you...

♪Johnny rosin up your bow and play your fiddle hard, cuz Hell's broke loose in Georgia and the devil deals the cards, and if you win you get this shiny fiddle made of gold, but if you lose the devil gets your soul~!♪

♪Johnny did you ever know that time keeps marchin' on, the coldest hour is the one comes just before the dawn, the devil's back in Georgia will you stand up to the test, or will you let the devil be the best?♪
Yoooo! It's me, Critical Darling, comin' at'cha as live as can be! Who's ready to rock?
'Sup? Who's ready to get their butt handed to 'em by me and my ice powers?... Oh, this ain't a fight...?
This ain't no hologram! It's the real Critical Darling, live and in-person! Who's ready to get rocked?
'Sup? It's ya girl, Critical Darling, famed rock star and pro wrestler! Are ya ready to rock?
Hey, don't expect me to smash my guitar when we're done, 'kay? I respect my instruments!
It's me, Ibuki Akiyama, AKA Icebreath, AAKA Critical Darling! Who's ready to go sub-zero?
It's me, Ibuki Akiyama, AKA Icebreath, AAKA Critical Darling, but not AKA Grape Girl. I got nothin' to do with grapes, I mean, c'mon...
Yo, Critical Darling here... What? You don't get it? My songs are "critical darlings," and I'm pretty darling too, see? It's like... a pun or somethin'.
Yo, Critical Darling here... What? You don't get it? See, a "critical darling" is somethin' that did well with critics but didn't draw in a big audience, just like me and my band, Melting Dreamscape!
I'm gonna rock your faces off and win that prize money!... Oh, there's no prize?... Well, I'll still rock your faces off, and then... you can tell your friends, or somethin'...
Hey, real quick, how much does this gig pay?... It doesn't?... Well, at least you're bein' real with me and not tellin' me I'll be "paid in exposure."
Gah ha! Talk about bein' "paid in exposure!..." You get it? Cuz we're not getting paid, and we'll be exposin' ourselves...? No? Not funny?
Ever wrestle with a rock star before? Or rock out with a wrestler, for that matter? Well this is your chance to do either of those things!
The name's Critical Darling, and if ya haven't heard of me, that's okay cuz not everyone listens to the same music or watches wrestling! See? I'm an understandin' gal.
If ya haven't heard of me, that's alright! I never heard of La Dragonesa 'til she kicked my butt! But don't worry, I'm not gonna kick your butts!
If ya haven't heard of me... well, I don't blame ya. It's hard to get famous, man!
Hey, if any of ya have actually heard of me or my band before, I'll give ya a free boob flash before we start! No lyin', now! We're usin' the honor system!

Heh heh! This plan is brilliant! None of y'all will be able to forget me or my band once ya see me naked, and y'all won't be able to resist tellin' your friends! It's the best marketing campaign in the world!
Heh heh! This plan is brilliant! No one ever forgets about the rock stars they've seen naked, and they can't resist tellin' all their friends about it! It's the best marketing campaign in the world!
♪What is coming has begun, it's somethin' that you gotta see! We lie and say that it's too late for some redemption!♪
♪Once again we got suffocated in a sick perversion of a spider's web!♪ Well, I got the perverted part right, but I'm pretty sure we're not stuck in a spider's web!
♪Here's an unexplainable one!♪ How the heck did I get here? I don't have a habit of gettin' lost or anything.
Good thing y'all got me and not that Nero Forte guy! I hear he's a real downer. Also he's dead, so he wouldn't be any fun anyway!
Good thing y'all got me and not Elevator Girl! She's all stoic and stuff. Totally not fun to hang around. Plus, she doesn't even have elevator powers. Lame!
Good thing y'all got me and not, like, Dr. Worm or something! He's not a real doctor but he is a real worm -- like, an actual worm! I've seen him in person! He's crazy!
Good thing y'all got me and not, like... John Flansburgh!... Nah, that's not true. Even I wish I were John Flansburgh instead...
I got a real good feelin' about this match! Even if there's no prize, I got a feelin' that we won't be crashin' in my uncle's RV tonight!
It's me, Critical Darling. Yes, the one that got beat by La Dragonesa... But hey, I beat a buncha dudes before losin' to her!
Me: Critical Darling. My band: Melting Dreamscape. You: Probably gonna see me naked, but probably also gonna see my band play after this.
On a scale from Gilgamesh to Hammurabi, I'm feelin' pretty Hammurabi right now! Let's get this show on the road!
Hey, real quick, in case you're wonderin', these things hangin' off my skirt here? They're suspenders. A lotta people don't get that for some reason.
Y'all are gonna get to see just how good with my fingers I am! Cuz I suck at poker... But I do got guitar skills!
Any chance the winner of this will get a golden fiddle?... No?... Well, at least I'm not bettin' my soul either...
I'll take your bet, and you're gonna regret, cuz I'm the best there's ever been!
♪On a cold winter morning, in the time before the light, in flames of death's eternal reign we ride towards the fight!♪
I'm probably not the Ibuki you're hopin' for, but I hope you enjoy playin' with me anyway!
♪I'll! Teach you! Who! Rocks! It's me! It's me!♪
♪Liar! Killer! Demon! Back to the River Aras! Someone's blank stare deemed it warfare!♪
What the fuck?! Me?! How?!
Whoa! Wait, what?! Me?! I can't clone myself, I swear!
Aw man, I thought I was one of a kind. Guess not...
Doppelganger, impersonator, or secret power I never knew I had...? Nah, probably just ~player~ fuckin' with some stuff.
Aw, ~player~, did'ja go outta your way to play with more than one'a me? Ya really can't get enough of me, eh? I dunno what to say...
Gah ha! At least now I can sing harmonies with myself!
Imagine how freakin' mind-blowing it'd be to pull this reveal on stage. I'm standin' up there, playin' like normal, then another me walks out? That'd be epic!
♪I'm Ibuki, yes I'm the real Ibuki, all you other Ibukis are just imitatin', so won't the real Ibuki please stand up, please stand up, please stand up!♪
Huh. I don't got a good feelin' about this match. I don't normally get bad feelin's about things...
Oh, uh, yeah, sure, sorry. This good?
I know, right? It's so hard to get famous!
I totally know you! You're that guy! The one with the sword, and the cape, and the giant robot!... I mean, not that guy with the sword and the cape and the giant robot, but the other guy! That guy!
Yeah! No limits! ANYTHING CAN BE AN INSTRUMENT! ROCK OUT TO THE SONG OF YOUR HEART!
Yeah! No limits! ANYTHING CAN BE AN INSTRUMENT! EVEN MAYONNAISE! ROCK OUT TO THE SONG OF YOUR HEART!
Whoa, that's actually pretty neat! I wonder what other heroes got power-regulatin' masks...?
Who's up for some ice-cold Kool-Aid! I got the ice! Y'all can drink it all, though, cuz I don't like cherry flavored stuff!
Oh man! Too bad this ain't a fight. Beatin' up the Kool-Aid guy would be such a cool story to tell people!
Nuh-uh! Nope! I don't trust that plushie! There's totally some kinda eldritch monster hidin' in it!
No no no! Someone get that plushie outta here! At best there's a bomb in it, and at worst there's a face-eatin' eldritch monster hidin' inside!
I don't trust talkin' plushies! That's how you get tricked into some kinda death trap! He's totally gonna try to trap us in a fun-house or somethin'!
"Glass Joe?" That name doesn't inspire much confidence, dude! You gotta change it to, like, "Metal Joe" or somethin'!
"Glass Joe...?" Oh, like "Glass Canon," right? Ya don't gotta take hits if ya dish 'em fast and hard enough, right?
Sorry, bud, but if suction cups are all ya got, my money's on the other guy every time! Toyslinger's plunger guns didn't get him far, so I don't got much faith in yours!
Ugh, no pasta for me, thanks. When your tourin' budget is basically zero, you eat way too much ramen...
No pasta for me, thanks. I had ramen for lunch... and dinner yesterday... and lunch yesterday too... I don't eat well...
You don't, like, only cook spaghetti, right? I'm gettin' kinda sick of pasta, but I'd kill for a nice burger.
You don't got any powers, huh? That's okay. Havin' powers ain't all it's cracked up to be. This ice won't get me the stardom I dream of! Not musically, anyway.
I know it's, like, the stereotypical punk thing to do, but I never skip school. Education is important, yo!
Hey, even normal gals can be special! Ya don't need ice powers like me! Just look at Cherry Bomb or La Escarabajo! If ya ain't extraordinary, make yourself extraordinary!
♪If everyone's so special then maybe you can't be what you want to be, even through the falseness and contempt you breed! Your life is yours so live each day, do you need to be special to feel okay?♪
Honestly? If that were my car, I'd sell it. Tourin' in an RV ain't great, but it's better than tourin' in an old car.
Yeah, we already tried the whole "tourin' in a car" thing with my band. It sucks, dude. So cramped!
Tourin' in a car's all fun and game's 'til someone jams their boob on a peghead...
Yeah, tourin' in a car's fun, if ya like being buried under your gear. I didn't mind it 'til my legs fell asleep...
Aw man, couldn't we have gotten the car from a cool song, like Black Sunshine or somethin'?
Emily? Is that you? What's with that getup? I thought you dropped the school girl look!
"Default-chan?" What happened to "Smash Hit," Emily? Now the rest of us gotta think up new nicknames so they all fit the same theme again!
Yoooo! It's Ribbon Girl! Hey, do ya think ya can help me get a record deal...?
Yeah! This guy gets it! Let's get this show on the road! Let's rock and roll!
"Derpy Hooves...?" Dang, that'd make a great band name. I wonder if it's too late to change...
Aw... Muffin... I want a muffin... Haven't been able to have one lately. My breakfasts have all been dry cereal lately...
Oh, my, gosh! A genie! Yes! Three wishes! Okay, I wish I had wings, and I wish my band was successful!... I'll figure the last one out later...
Yes! Three wishes! Let's see... I wish I had wings, I wish my band was successful, and... I dunno what to use the third wish for...
You're some kinda evil sand witch, right? You just met your match! Sand is totally week to ice! Everybody knows that!
You're some kinda evil sand witch, right? Oh! Haha! Sandwich... Aw, dang it, now I'm hungry... Anyone happen to bring any sandwiches...?
Out of all the mascots to see strip, Mister Clean... kinda makes sense. I mean, at least he's not, like, the Cheerios bee or somethin'.
Hey, do ya think after this you can come clean up my uncle's RV? I mean, it's not terrible, but if you're as good at cleanin' as your commercials say...
Ha! I knew ghosts were real! I mean, if zombies and vampires are real, why wouldn't ghosts be? But who would'a thought they'd be so cute?
Oh, hang on, lemme remember that thing La Dragonesa says at the start of her matches. It's, uh... Tengamos un partido justo! Pretty sure that means "I'm gonna kick your butt!"

♪You're insane, you are bad, you wreck everything you touch and you're a sociopath, and the only way to mitigate would be to know the date you're scheduled to vacate, when are you going to die? Look me in the eye, tell me when you'll die!♪
Oh, you're streamin' this? Awesome! More fame! What's up, internet! It's me, the real Critical Darling! I kinda suck at poker, so you're probably gonna see me naked! Tell your friends!
When you find your guy, lemme know and I'll ice 'em!
Aw come on! You've got two sets of wings? I don't even have one!
Oh, this place is hologram-enabled? Great. Makes me bein' here almost redundant...
Paris? How the heck did I end up here? You can't get here in an RV!
Wait, what the heck, we're in Paris? How freakin' lost do ya gotta get to go from Seattle to Paris? In an RV, no less!
Okay, seriously, how the fuck did I end up in Paris? I was just torin' the US! In an RV! I'm freakin' the fuck out right now!

Gah ha! This is like that one bit: "Welcome to Hawaii! How'd you get here in a car?" 'Cept it's Paris, and my car is an RV! Also, there's no welcome sign! But seriously, how did I get here in an RV?...
Heh. Crowds don't bother me! I've been on stage and in the ring!
Pffft. Public nudity. Like I've never been to a bathhouse before!
♪All the broken glass reminds me of home! Brings up all the memories of long ago!♪... Er, that's a reference, by the way. I didn't come from a bad home...
Gah ha! I better not tell Charlotte where we played this! She'd be so mad!
It's no Enoshima Beach, but this place is nice!
Dang! Look at this place! This is the cushiest gig I've ever had!
What if I told ya I work here?... Well I don't, but could ya imagine? Me? An office chick? Gah ha!
Hey, uh, there any people workin' here right now? I can get kinda loud and I wouldn't want to disturb anyone while they're workin'.
Do we gotta play here? I ain't good at bein' quiet...
Time to get kicked out of a library! That's kinda punk, right?
Ooh, I hope this place has some rhythm games! I can kick your butts at anything but DDR!
Ooh, I hope this place has that version of Groove Coaster that has the NecroDancer remixes in it! Those are so good!
Ooh, paparazzi! Here, I'll strike a sick pose for ya!
Ooh, paparazzi! Hey, is this a good pose, or do ya want a different one?
Aw man, who called the cops? I haven't even broken anything yet!
Aw man, it's too early for the cops. You're not supposed to show up 'til after my performance gets going!
Aw, the police? Is this about that motel room? I swear it was like that when we got there! Honest! It was just a really crappy motel!
Aw, the police? This ain't about that chair I broke at that motel, is it? I swear I didn't do it on purpose, the chair broke when I sat in it!
This reminds me of that one time I was playin' a show in my backyard, and someone called the cops, but the cops were into the music and started jammin' to it! No joke!
Uh, h-hey, lemme make it clear, I got powers, but I ain't a super hero! I swear! I'm just here to promote my band!
Ah! I'm not a super hero, I swear! I got ice powers, but I ain't lookin' for a fight! Promise! I just wanna promote my band!
I ain't here to turn anyone in! I-I'm not a super hero! I live for music, I swear!
Aw, is this some kinda sick joke? Three dudes with wings here? Well, at least that dude doesn't have wings either...
Wait what, we can show up naked?... Maybe I should'a done that...?
Yoooo! It's me, Critical Darling, comin' at'cha as live as can be! Who's ready to rock?
'Sup? Who's ready to get their butt handed to 'em by me and my ice powers?... Oh, this ain't a fight...?
This ain't no hologram! It's the real Critical Darling, live and in-person! Who's ready to get rocked?
'Sup? It's ya girl, Critical Darling, famed rock star and pro wrestler! Are ya ready to rock?
Hey, don't expect me to smash my guitar when we're done, 'kay? I respect my instruments!
It's me, Ibuki Akiyama, AKA Icebreath, AAKA Critical Darling! Who's ready to go sub-zero?
It's me, Ibuki Akiyama, AKA Icebreath, AAKA Critical Darling, but not AKA Grape Girl. I got nothin' to do with grapes, I mean, c'mon...
I'm gonna rock your faces off and win that prize money!... Oh, there's no prize?... Well, I'll still rock your faces off, and then... you can tell your friends, or somethin'...
Hey, real quick, how much does this gig pay?... It doesn't?... Well, at least you're bein' real with me and not tellin' me I'll be "paid in exposure."
Gah ha! Talk about bein' "paid in exposure!..." You get it? Cuz we're not getting paid, and we'll be exposin' ourselves...? No? Not funny?
Ever wrestle with a rock star before? Or rock out with a wrestler, for that matter? Well this is your chance to do either of those things!
The name's Critical Darling, and if ya haven't heard of me, that's okay cuz not everyone listens to the same music or watches wrestling! See? I'm an understandin' gal.
If ya haven't heard of me, that's alright! I never heard of La Dragonesa 'til she kicked my butt! But don't worry, I'm not gonna kick your butts!
If ya haven't heard of me... well, I don't blame ya. It's hard to get famous, man!
Hey, if any of ya have actually heard of me or my band before, I'll give ya a free boob flash before we start! No lyin', now! We're usin' the honor system!

Heh heh! This plan is brilliant! None of y'all will be able to forget me or my band once ya see me naked, and y'all won't be able to resist tellin' your friends! It's the best marketing campaign in the world!
Heh heh! This plan is brilliant! No one ever forgets about the rock stars they've seen naked, and they can't resist tellin' all their friends about it! It's the best marketing campaign in the world!
♪What is coming has begun, it's somethin' that you gotta see! We lie and say that it's too late for some redemption!♪
♪Once again we got suffocated in a sick perversion of a spider's web!♪ Well, I got the perverted part right, but I'm pretty sure we're not stuck in a spider's web!
Good thing y'all got me and not that Nero Forte guy! I hear he's a real downer. Also he's dead, so he wouldn't be any fun anyway!
Good thing y'all got me and not Elevator Girl! She's all stoic and stuff. Totally not fun to hang around. Plus, she doesn't even have elevator powers. Lame!
Good thing y'all got me and not, like, Dr. Worm or something! He's not a real doctor but he is a real worm -- like, an actual worm! I've seen him in person! He's crazy!
Good thing y'all got me and not, like... John Flansburgh!... Nah, that's not true. Even I wish I were John Flansburgh instead...
I got a real good feelin' about this match! Even if there's no prize, I got a feelin' that we won't be crashin' in my uncle's RV tonight!
It's me, Critical Darling. Yes, the one that got beat by La Dragonesa... But hey, I beat a buncha dudes before losin' to her!
Me: Critical Darling. My band: Melting Dreamscape. You: Probably gonna see me naked, but probably also gonna see my band play after this.
On a scale from Gilgamesh to Hammurabi, I'm feelin' pretty Hammurabi right now! Let's get this show on the road!
Y'all are gonna get to see just how good with my fingers I am! Cuz I suck at poker... But I do got guitar skills!
Any chance the winner of this will get a golden fiddle?... No?... Well, at least I'm not bettin' my soul either...
I'll take your bet, and you're gonna regret, cuz I'm the best there's ever been!
♪On a cold winter morning, in the time before the light, in flames of death's eternal reign we ride towards the fight!♪
♪All my life I've been over the top, I don't know what I'm doing all I know is I don't wanna stop!♪
I'm probably not the Ibuki you're hopin' for, but I hope you enjoy playin' with me anyway!
This line keeps track of how many times you've played with me so I can thank ya for it later!
♪Now the world is gone, I'm just one! Oh God, help me! Hold my breath as I wish for death! Oh please, God, help me!♪
♪We are the one! Together! We are the only one! Your are the one! Forever!♪
♪I need just one~!♪
Heh! Even when I'm not tryin', I can still kick butt! I don't need any cards!
Gah! Why couldn't I have been this lucky when life decided what powers I'd get...?
I ain't good at poker, but I ain't stupid either! I ain't changin' a thing!
These ~cards.text~ are ♪more than I thought they could be, so I'm setting them free!♪
I'll banish these ~cards.text~ from my hand ♪to a life beyond the stars!♪
♪Exit bad cards! Enter new cards! Take my hand! We're off to never neverland!♪

♪Second chances they don't ever matter, people never change! Once a whore you're nothing more, I'm sorry, that'll never change! And about forgiveness, we're both supposed to have exchanged♪ -- Oh right! Exchange! I need ~cards.text~!
Gimme ~cards.text~! Don't think, just play! Just like playin' the drums!
Gah, it's hard for me to want to throw my hands. I still kinda want to win...
Uh, gimme ~cards.text~, I guess, I dunno.
Sorry, you ~cards.text~, you're outta the band -- er, hand!
♪The ~cards.text~ that pierce the sky, she left them all behind! We're left to wonder why, she left us all... behind!♪
♪Hey, Miss Murder can I -- Hey, Miss Murder can I, make beauty stay if I, take some cards! Whoa-oh-oh!♪
Let's get this hand in tune.
♪Reaching out for the hand of God, but did you think you'd shake your own?!♪ That's what gettin' this hand is like!
♪Whoa! It was never my intention to brag! To steal it all away from you now!♪... Well, I guess I didn't steal all the good hands...
♪Hello, hand! We all salute you, hand! Five cards strong, it's good to have you back again!♪ Well, maybe not again, but y'know, good to have it cuz I'll hold out a bit longer with it.
Pffft! I knew learnin' poker tactics was a waste of time! I didn't need any practice!
I traded poker skill for guitar skill and it still worked out!
Man, if playin' poker is this easy, I feel bad for anyone who spent time tryin' to get good at it instead of gettin' good at somethin' else!
This hand should work! Yeah!... No... Maybe? I don't know. Can you repeat the question?
♪Grade on a curve, and you'll observe, I'm right below the horizon!♪ A pair's below average, right...?
On a scale from Gilgamesh to Hammurabi, this hand is pretty Ashurbanipal.
Man, this hand is so Ashurbanipal that it's tellin' me my haircut makes me look like a Mohenjo-daroan!
♪In our darkest dreams we do believe our destiny this time!♪ Especially cuz I don't care if I win or lose!
♪As the red day is dawning, and the lightning cracks the sky, they'll raise their hands to the heavens above with resentment in their eyes!♪
♪You wanna sing, to drown out the car horn, squeeze your eyes shut and scream like a new born, like new born babe!♪ At least, I would if I minded bad hands!
♪Fuck! Fuck! Fuuuuuuuuck...♪ I'm not really upset, I just thought that'd be a funny reference.
♪Life is a misery, don't know how it's come to be! Death, the epitome of all of our days!♪... Okay, death is a little too far for a bad poker hand, but I just wanted to sing that...

♪No one in the world ever gets what they want and that is beautiful! Everybody dies frustrated and sad and that is beautiful!♪ Althought actually losin' is in my plan, so I did get what I want with this junk hand.
I ain't even worried! The more I lose, the more you'll remember me!
This hand is just like Daft Punk: no longer a duo... I'm more bummed about rememberin' that than I am the cards...
GRRRRRRRAH! Cough cough! Ow! I suck at death growls...
Look like this game has officially become a duel. Good thing we're not playin' guitars here, or else you'd be doomed!
I haven't even been on a regular date, let alone a Christmas one...
Huh. I dunno. I guess I could make ya somethin' outta ice to hide behind if it's a problem for ya.
Heh, what music don't I listen to? I listen to whatever's good, that's what I listen to!

condition.saying: So... everyone enjoying the game so far? I sure am! Anyone maybe want to put some faith in a certain goddess? Help her out a little, eh?
So... how is everyone doing? Having fun? I hope so! Anyone thought about a goddess they would like to put their faith in? Help her out and such?

case.state: Oh yeah, ya make a good point, I suppose I do owe a bit to Benzaiten!... How can I help her out, though...?
A beach with robot cops? That's sounds sick!
"~Player~," eh? That's one'a those fetish things, right? I'll play along!
"~Player~," eh...? A little awkward, but whatevs, I'll play along.
"~Player~," eh? That's one'a those fetish things, right? I'll play along!
Ah, you're like the people chain up in the cave in the allegory of the people in the cave by the Greek guy!
Dunno about anyone else, but I don't gotta do that. Everything is either rockin', or somethin' I gotta do before rockin', so there's always motivation!
I love Audino! They look so soft and squishy, I just wanna take a nap while squeezin' one!
Ya won't get mad if I say ya got a big butt, right? Cuz ya do, but it ain't a bad thing!
Right right. Makeup's an enhancer, not a beauty-maker. Ya gotta look good outta makeup to look good in it, y'know?
Y-yeah, good luck with that! Ya gotta follow your dreams!
Whoa whoa! Hey, you're done! You don't gotta take more off!
Uh, yeah, ya do like boys, right?
I dunno... I think it might be somethin' to do with the pop industry, how pop stars are expected to have a certain image... but actors can have any number of images cuz that's what actors do...?
I've heard of ya before, so of course I already know about the ARMS Ability too.
Oh, now that I didn't know! Hey, do ya think ya can power an amp that way?
Uh, I dunno, probably gonna rehearse, I guess.
I wanna be a rock star, duh! One'a these days, I'm gonna turn our national tour into a world tour!
Ha! Card battles! Who needs that when ya can fight with your fists!... And ice powers too.
Why do I get the feelin' you're one'a those people who'd use wrestling as a way of learnin' her powers?
Hey, your cards remind me, Cherry Bomb once told me she almost debuted as a fighter with magic Hanafuda cards, but she couldn't get them to do what she wanted so she switched to fireworks!
Sorry, you ain't the first zombie I've met. I fought one in the ring.
Those glove thingies would be pretty rad for stage effects! Too bad I wouldn't be able to play in 'em!
Aw, dang it...
Hmmm, I dunno. On the one hand, it could inspire a new song, but on the other, that's time I could spend praticin'...
Ah, nope, sorry. History was always my weakest subject...
Do statues count as "artifacts?" Cuz I've always liked lookin' at naked statues. Some sculpters really know how to sculpt a penis...
♪The statue got me high! The statue got me high! The truth is where the sculptor's chisel chipped away the lie!♪
♪A rock that spoke a word! An animated mineral, it can be heard! And though I once preferred a human being's company, they pale before the monolith that towers over me!♪
Ain't me! My underwear ain't gonna surprise anyone!
I'm here to promote my band, Melting Dreamscape! I hope y'all will give us a listen after this!
Heck yeah I wanna be famous! I want my whole band to be famous! Famous for playin' good music, obviously, and not, like, famous for havin' really bad songs or somethin'.
I mean, yeah, but if ya can't joke about it, ya probably also shouldn't bring it up lightly, y'know what I mean? So I can't exactly say what I think they are.
A friend is someone ya enjoy bein' around that you've grown to trust and believe in. Friendship don't start the moment ya know each others' names, it's somethin' ya forge.

Nope! Me and my bandmates play video games when we're bored rather than board games, so we don't even got a deck!

Where do ya live, Yusuke? I might be able to take ya there.
A sale, huh? I should probably get in on that...

condition.saying: On one hand, I desire to see everyone disrobe, but the caveat of the forfeit is something I simply cannot look forward to.

case.state: Huh, really? Why's that? Why look at naked people if you're not gonna get off to 'em?

I, uh... I dunno... I don't got any "play strip poker with 'em" kinda loved ones...
Ramen. Literally! Gah ha!... My tour budge sucks...
I dunno about stupid-lookin', but I can say I don't like it. Too traditional for my tastes.
Deck? Like, cards? I ain't a card person.
Totally. Like there was this one dance I wanted to go to, but then I got all dressed up and went there, and then I went home after just a few minutes...
I've only felt that way from large groups. I've never felt that way when hangin' around my friends, but Kara does sometimes. We're sure to give her space when she needs it.
... Now that you mention it, yeah... Yeah, I totally have...
Nope! I don't think I got a mean gene in my body! Sure, I mess up sometimes, but it ain't cuz I'm mean!
Yeah. Especially when I'm tryin' to sleep...
I like a lotta foods a lot, and they're pretty obvious, so I'll just good with fruit tarts! They're like this cookie that's covered in whipped cream and fruit! So good!
Can't say I've ever had more than a celebrity crush, so... nope!

Probably Yokohama's skyline at sunset. Or at night. Both are great!

Well, I already said mine, so, uh... I got nothin'.
Pamperin', eh? I dunno... I don't think I've ever been pampered before... Hot baths are nice, I guess...

Then ya gotta come to one'a my shows! You can't stop me from shreddin' when I'm on stage!
Oh, I just meant that in general. All those super heroes out there ain't special just cuz some got powers, y'know? But anyway, what do ya wanna be when ya finish school?

I've only ever heard birds' chirpin' as chirpin', so I guess that's a no... You got the power to talk to animals or somethin'...?
I ain't one to tell people what song is in their heart, but if I were you? I'd start playin' metal -- or at least start a zombie-flavored pop subgenre.
Never knew bottomless could look so good, but you're killin' it, Mia!
I can't help but wonder what your hands feel like...
Hmm. Not sure if I like how ya look wearin' nothin' but sunglassess...
I dig the sunglassess! Ya think I'd look good in a pair like that?
So if ya got a Monkey Dance, what other dances do ya got? Ya got a Deer Dance, or a Spider Dance?
Oh, ya know, it's a place... with forests, and deserts, and, uh... I dunno. It's kinda hard to compare a whole world to another world I've never been to, y'know?
Nah, you're fine. It's good that ya got somethin' to talk about!
Well, it's my first time doin' somethin' like this in person, but I have seen this stuff before. Y'know, cuz of the internet.
Beats me. I've never gotten a date before...
I've, uh... I've never dated anyone before...
I get what you were sayin', though. Could I kill to save the world? I dunno... I don't like the idea of killin' someone...
Ah, that's easy, guitar duel! As long as my opponent ain't, like, Herman Lee or whatevs, I bet I could win!
Movies?... Uh... I dunno, what are they playin' right now...?
Does wrestling count if it's the TV kind and not the school kind? Otherwise, my answer's "nope."
Can't say I have. I ain't normally a gambler!

Oh, geez, I ain't qualified to answer questions like that... But if the world is at stake, wouldn't tryin' leave the one guy alive defeat the point, cuz they'd die with the rest of the world too, right...?
A guy at one'a my last shows told us about it. He left out the part about strippin', but I was smart enough to do my research before comin' here!
I dunno if I should be more surprised you're a goddess or concerned that the one actual goddess I have proof of isn't one I've ever heard of before...
Aw man! Your power is so cool! Yet another power that would'a been cooler to have than ice...
Recently I saw this video of a bird groovin' to different songs. So cute!
Wha-- I've never killed! I'm just a rocker! Rocker's ain't got no reason to kill!
Heck yeah, do some dancin'! It's like you're one'a those caged ladies!
Only if we're eatin' somewhere that has other things to eat on the menu! I've eaten too much ramen lately...
Guitar, obviously! It'd be pretty sad if I spent all that time practicin' and wasn't skilled with it.
I mean, well... technically, yeah. But I guess your experiences shape who ya are, so... it's like that paradox about the ship that gets repaired a lot.
I mean, maybe one day, but definitely not soon.
Uh... I dunno. I guess it depends on what you've seen on other planets. Have ya seen forests? We got those. Deserts? Got those too. Ya like seas? We got like seven of 'em.

Hey, are ya Cherry Bomb's brother or somethin'? She once told me she almost fought with Hanafuda cards, was that cuz it was your idea?
Why do I get Muerte Obscura vibes from you, card dude? Are ya one'a his friends or somethin'?
Aw man, it's been so long since I had some fries. Doesn't help that cheap fries are all total garbo...

♪They call me Dr. Butterfly! Good morning how are you, I'm Dr. Butterfly! I'm interested in things! I'm not a real doctor but I am a real butterfly, I am an actual butterfly!♪
Huh... I wonder if I should'a got a hat like that one and went with a witch look...? Nah! Punk's more fun! Sweet hat, though!
Either you're a big fan of Archangel Nemesis or you both coincidentally got feathered wings and went with an angel themed costume. In any case, I'm so jealous of your wings...
Are you Archangel Nemesis's brother or somethin'? And you both got wings? Some families have all the luck...
Oh, sorry, I thought that's how genies work...
"Ultimate Gamer," you say? Well I guess I know your favorite Slipknot song: Insert Coin!... Which isn't a bad option, but like, c'mon, Unsainted is like right there.
"Ultimate Gamer," you say? Well I guess I know your favorite Slipknot song: Insert Coin!... Mine's Nero Forte, by the way.
Thanks, Nagisa. I love this skirt too. Aren't skirts just the best?
It's all good. I probably got some weird habits too that I don't realize no one else does.
I ain't about to gamble money. Pretty sure Charlotte would get mad at me for that, plus I don't got any cash on me right now anyway!
Oh, uh, okay. Sorry I couldn't help, I guess.
Oh, uh, yeah, but it's just a name. All my bandmates got stage names like that too. Our bassist is "Hidden Gem," our drummer is "Cult Classic," and our keyboardist is "Smash Hit."
Nah, it's this tortilla shell stuffed with meat and cheese and other stuff. The shell can be hard or soft, and the meat can be mild or spicy.

Sorry, I didn't mean to put down your gallerie's buffet, it's just caviar's expensive and cheese and crackers is more like a snack. I think of a meal as bein' somethin' more hearty, like steak and potatoes.

I dunno if interactivity would make a gallery more fun for me...

Some other weird things I've heard of... Well, there's that robot that came to life cuz it was sick of bein' spare parts... there's that spider doll chick... and I'm still weirded out by that Wereshark chick.
I know, it's totally weird, right? Like, what's the difference? How is magic not just a super power? What makes what I do different than what some mage can do?
Ice powers are neat, but wings are so much more dope! Imagine a guitarist, up on stage, flyin' around while shreddin'! I wanna be that guitarist!
What good's predictin' the weather for? Can't ya just open up your weather app?
So what's some weird stuff that happens in your universe, Supernova?
I don't know much about it either! All I know is I can shoot ice, and some people can shoot more!
Gah ha ha! Told ya!
You're not really shreddin' yourself, you're shreddin' on your strings, which really just means "playin' really fast."

Gah ha ha! Imagine bettin' your soul for noodle bread! It's like somethin' out of a comedy!

Yeah! Exactly!

Uh, I dunno, hard to say without knowin' what your universe has got. Ever try tacos?

It's a pretty normal dimension, I guess? Magic exists, but ya gotta have like special blood or somethin', but people do got non-magic powers that are kinda like magic anyway... which doesn't really make sense...
With some of the things I've seen, I could believe there's talkin' animals in this universe! Apparently there's a crocodile smart enough to make himself a robot suit!
Mmm... Nope, don't see one. Should I take a closer look, or ya good...?
I love playin' guitar, does that count...?
Geez, ~player~, if you're gonna jerk off, stop playin' coy and whip it out!
I really like watermelon-flavored things and anything with chocolate. But really, as long as it ain't cherry-flavored, I'll eat anything!
Gah ha! I haven't killed anything bigger than a spider!... Although I did kill a daddy longlegs when we toured through Texas...
Strip poker? No. Regular poker?... Also no. Keh heh... I ain't a card game person, so I really only play Hanafuda with my family.
I got a husky named Pearl, and my aunt and uncle got a cat named Kibo that I see whenever we visit family. I love 'em both lots!
Oh, uh, I dunno, I'm not from around here. We can probably find some abandoned building or somethin' if we look hard enough, I guess.
Nah, I ain't much of a sports chick. If we're gonna compete at somethin', I'd rather it be a guitar duel!
I'll listen to anything, but I'm all about that power metal! Let's hear ya shred, dude!
... Tomatoes...?
Oh, well, uh, I dunno about how good I'd look if I had my glasses on. Not sure they'd fit my look, anyway...
Oh, but see, the thing about the devil is he wants everyone's souls. It's, like, an ego thing or somethin'. It's good that there's nothin' he can tempt ya with, though!
Sorry I wasn't clearer, Nagisa. I meant is there anything that's, like, a privilege ya got that ya wish ya could trade for another?
Huh, dang, singin' powers must be more common than I thought...

Shreddin' ain't painful. Ya build up calluses way before ya get on that skill level.

Selfish...? I mean, I guess it is selfish, but there are already tons of super heroes out there. Is it really bad that I ain't one of 'em?

I wanna do good death growls cuz they're metal, that's why!

Uh, I dunno... I guess it'd be pretty sweet to talk to my dog.
I know I gotta use the back of my throat more. Kara told me that too, I just dunno how to do that.

Don'tcha think our styles are too different for that to work out, Miku? I think your usual crowd would hate my band.
You play guitar, Miku? How's that work?

I got glasses, Miku, I just don't wear 'em cuz glassess ain't part of my look!
Bandmates gotta be close, Miku, or else it ain't fun. Ya don't wanna end up hatin' the songs ya make together and eventually breakin' up.
Not literal metal, ya silly robot, metal like the music! Metal singers do death growls all the time!
It's all good, Penny. Ya didn't hurt my feelin's, ya just gave me somethin' to think about!
Ah, sorry, I can't donate. I'm on a pretty strict budget, myself.
Wait wait, notoriety? Why ya gotta assume my band's bad?
Pffft. "I don't really have any cute ones." All skirts are cute skirts, my dude! What're some ones ya got?

How's the crowd feelin' about this game so far, eh?! Pretty great, right?!
This is one killer match, am I right, y'all?!
It's your birthday, eh? Happy freakin' birthday to ya!

How's the crowd feelin' about this game so far, eh?!
I've never been arrested before, so I'd be okay with gettin' busted for public nudity here. Having an arrest record would be pretty punk, but I ain't about actual criminal activity, y'know?
Gah! Beach shows! Why didn't I think of it before! How often do ya see a metal band play on the beach, eh? Never! That's why it's brilliant!
Oh shit, I just realized I'm gonna see boys jack off to each other! In person! And maybe more! Hell yeah!
So it's just us chicks for this, eh? That's cool. I welcome all audiences!
Ladies' night tonight, eh? No complaints here!
Hey, fair warning, dudes, I got ice powers, so don't try anything funny, 'kay?
Fair warning, dudes, try anything funny with me and I'll whip out the Flash-Freeze Solo on ya!

It's pretty cool you became a superhero. I got powers too, but I don't let 'em rule my life, y'know? I wanna be a rocker, so that's what I'm gonna be!
It's pretty cool you became a superhero. I could'a been one too, but there are plenty of 'em out there already, and I just wanna rock.
It's pretty cool y'all became superheroes. I got powers too, but I don't let 'em rule my life, y'know? I wanna be a rocker, so that's what I'm gonna be!
It's pretty cool y'all became superheroes. I could'a been one too, but there are plenty of 'em out there already, and I just wanna rock.
I didn't realize how long this would take. Good thing we don't got any gigs today... or tomorrow... or -- I should stop talking...
Didn't realize this was gonna take so long. Lemme take a sec to text Charlotte. If I don't, she's gonna worry.
Geez, there are some really great songs that are like seven minutes long, but this is ridiculous. This game's goin' long, is what I'm sayin'.

Y'know what I really like about metal? The guitar can express many different emotions while still soundin' metal. Happy, sad, and obviously angry! Name a mood and I can name a metal song that covers it!
... Why'd it take me so long to realize I need black nail polish. Like seriously, I should be ashamed to not have any.
Yo, I really need some black nail polish. I mean, punk can be punk without nail polish, but I think it looks rad, therefore, I need it.
Ugh, now that I think about it, I gotta get some black nail polish. It's pretty much a crime that I don't have any.
Now we can achieve hadaka no tsukiai! That's where ya become friends while naked, if ya didn't know.
Charlotte's our bassist, by the way. She's also basically our manager, since she books the gigs, drives the RV, and all that other junk.
Kara's our drummer, by the way. She can also sing black metal way better than I can, so sometimes we swap around so she can take the mic!
Emily's our keyboardist, by the way. Or in the case of songs that don't got keyboard in them, she's the chick who hits a beer keg with a baseball bat!
I'm Critical Darling, by the way, but you can call me just "Darling," or "CD," or whatevs.
I'm Critical Darling, by the way. I mean, that's my stage name, not my actual name, but you're more likely to know me by my stage name!
I'm Critical Darling, by the way. Y'know, the NHBF Wrestling chick... that lost to La Dragonesa in the semi-finals...
Ugh, geez, I think I need some water...
Ugh, geez, I need to ♪grab for some water! But I'm that pill that's to jagged to swallow!♪ Cough! But seriously, I need some water...
Oh, right, I should explain, that "Gilgamesh to Hammurabi" scale thing is something I made up with my bandmates. "Gilgamesh" is bad, and then it goes "Ashurbanipal," "Sargon," and then "Hammurabi."
I gotta admit, though, as much as I appreciate my powers, I still wish I at least could shoot fire instead of ice. That'd be way more metal...
Did'ja ever heard about those dudes that have singing powers? Like, they make stuff happen when they sing? I'd still rather have wings, but that sounds pretty dope anyway!
By the way, I don't mean to sound like I don't appreciate my powers! They work great for special effects during shows -- which is double-great cuz Charlotte won't let us use pyrotechnics!
If any of y'all need to cool down, just let me know! There's no limit to how much ice I can make!... Probably!
♪It's summertime and you know what that means, gonna head down to the beach, gonna do some neachy things!♪
♪It's summertime, it feels just right, gonna gather all my friends and we'll party through the night!♪
♪It's summertime luh-uh-loving, it's loving in the summertime! It's summertime luh-uh-loving, oh baby why can't you be mine?♪

♪You're older than you've ever been, and now you're even older, and now you're even older, and now you're even older! You're older than you've ever been, and now you're even older, and now you're older still!♪
♪Time... is marching on!... And time... is still marching on!♪
Oh, uh, hope ya don't mind, most of the birthday songs I know are existential.
You haven't lived until you've heard Emily sing Raining Blood in her cutest voice!
Oh, Emily can also play bass, which is great cuz it lets Charlotte pick up rhythm guitar for some songs!
Some might call Charlotte a buzzkill cuz she doesn't let us use pyrotechnics and she got mad at me for stage-divin' and stuff like that, but I know she's just lookin' out for us.

Oh, and Charlotte can also play guitar, which you might expect out of a bassist, but not every takes the time to learn both properly. I'm better at shreddin' than she is, but she's got a better understandin' of chords.
Kara's like the chillest person I've ever met, which is funny cuz I'm the one with the ice powers
Now that I think about it, Kara's the strongest one of us in the band. She can lift Emily up over her head!
♪It's summertime luh-uh-loving, it's loving in the summertime!♪ Gah! Dang it, Summertime Loving, Loving in the Summer (Time), get outta my head!
I know most people with superpowers go hero and stuff, but I'm the kinda chick who doesn't let somethin' like powers steer her away from what she really wants in life!
I know most dudes with powers become heroes, but I never wanted to be one. There are plenty of other heroes out there already anyway, so I'm free to rock!
I know most people with powers become superheroes, but I'd probably just get myself killed doin' that. Besides, bein' a superhero won't fund my rockin'!
Not to brag, but I can play, like, half of Through The Fire And The Flames on a real guitar. My hand always cramps up and stops me, though... But the half I can play is sure to blow ya away!

Hey, would any of y'all bet your soul and duel the devil for somethin'? I wouldn't! Not even for wings!... Well maybe... No! Well... No! No, definitely not! If JB and KG couldn't beat him, I sure can't!
Oh, by the way, if it wasn't already clear, I really wish I had wings. I have ice powers, but I'd trade them for wings if I could. Any of you got anything like that in your lives?

It's pretty obvious that I like purple, but y'know what other color I like? Slime green! I would'a had some slime green accents on this outfit if I had anything in that color, but I'm lucky enough that I had what I'm wearin' to begin with!
Any of y'all happen to be lookin' for an alternative band? We're still lookin' to book some gigs.
By the way, I ain't just a guitarist. I'm also a drummer and keyboardist! Any of y'all know how to play anything?
I know the whole "topless with suspenders" look is hot, but these suspenders are strictly for danglin' at my sides!
We've never had anyone flash us during a concert, by the way. Our songs just don't inspire toplessness, I guess!
I'm kinda bummed that the magic solos from Brütal Legend aren't real, but at least I got my own version of the Face Melter -- I call it the "Flash-Freeze Solo!"
Man, I wanna get a steel guitar sometime. That'd be sweet... I can't even explain how much I want to try shreddin' on one, it's not even funny...
See, headbangin' ain't just in the head. You also gotta throw your spine into it too. Like this!
... So why did Constantinople become Istanbul...? Ah, I guess ya only know if you're Turkish, huh...?

It's kinda funny; I like Daron Malakian's solo work, but not so much Serj Tankian's solo work. Clearly, Daron's the part of System of a Down I enjoy!
I know some people are mad at DragonForce for that time they had a bunch of technical difficulties, but I forgive 'em. I mean, it's not like they chose to have tech issues, y'know?
Y'know, I don't envy Babymetal; singin', dancin', wearin' those probably-heavy outfits under like a bazillion hot stage lights. I actually feel bad for 'em! I hope they're at least havin' fun!
